S1-A: VerSuccessAccRep, VerFailedAccRep, VerSuccessStartRep, VerFailedStartRep, VerSuccessPrgrRep, VerFailedPrgrRep, VerSuccessTermRep, VerFailedTermRep, VerFailedRoutingRep

S3-25: Periodic Housekeeping or Diagnostic Report (3,25) or (3,26)
S3-25s: One-Shot Housekeeping or Diagnostic Report (response to command (3,27) or (3,28))

S1-A: Parameter values are as defined by the service 1 procedures called in adaptation points S1-1 to S1-9
S3-25: The values of the data items associated to the report's SID in the RDL
S3-25s: The values of the data items associated to the report's SID in the RDL

S1-A: No discriminant attribute is defined for service 1 success reports. For failure reports, the failure code acts as discriminant.
S3-25: The Structure Identifier (SID) of the report
S3-25s: The Structure Identifier (SID) of the report

S1-A: The destination of service 1 reports is set equal to the source of the command being verified
S3-25: The destination is read from the \texttt{dest} field of the Report Definition corresponding to the report's SID
S3-25s: The destination is read from the \texttt{dest} field of the Report Definition corresponding to the report's SID
S17-2: The destination is set equal to the source of the (17,1) command which triggers the (17,2)
S17-4: The destination is set equal to the source of the (17,3) command which triggers the (17,4)

S3-25: The enable status is read from the \texttt{isEnabled} field of the Report Definition corresponding to the report's SID

Load the value of the simply-commutated data items from the data pool and that of the super-commutated data items from the Sampling Buffer associated to the report's SID according to the Report Definition
S3-25s: Load the value of the simply-commutated data items from the data pool and that of the super-commutated data items from the Sampling Buffer associated to the report's SID according to the Report Definition
